scripts.start:
echo 'Starting backend services...' && pnpm start:backend && echo '
Backend started! Now run "pnpm start:web" in another terminal for the web app.'
scripts.boom: pnpm stop && pnpm build && pnpm start --force-recreate && pnpm logs
scripts.monitoring:start: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.monitoring.yml up -d uptime-kuma
scripts.monitoring:stop: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.monitoring.yml stop uptime-kuma
